Senior Software Engineer

Acme Corp
San Francisco, CA

About the Role

We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our Platform team. You will be responsible for designing and building scalable microservices that power our core products.

Responsibilities

  • Design and develop scalable software solutions using Python and AWS
  • Build and maintain RESTful APIs and microservices
  • Mentor junior developers and participate in code reviews
  • Collaborate with product and design teams on new features
  • Implement CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices

Requirements

  • 5+ years of software engineering experience
  • Strong proficiency in Python
  • Experience with AWS services (EC2, Lambda, S3, RDS)
  • Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
  • Familiarity with PostgreSQL or similar databases
  • Excellent communication and problem-solving skills

Nice to Have

  • Experience with Terraform
  • Knowledge of machine learning concepts
  • Previous startup experience
